The following links go to videos of the physical model rotating individual bodies, one by one.
Video: Body-1 rotating (Change in theta)
Video: Body-2 rotating (Change in phi)
Video: Body-3 rotating (Change in psi)

Simulation control panel

To start, click "Start"
To change simulation settings and variables, click "Settings"

You may at any time pause or stop.
After stopping or before start, you may change any of the variables used
by the built-in Runge-Kutta function and see the effects on the simulation.
The Runge-Kutta has a set time interval it calculates for, once the simulation hits that it loops back to start.
